languages.text: {n}Монтэг стрелял на поражение. Меткий выстрел превратил легкое парня в лохмотья — удивительно, что он еще не захлебнулся кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Монтэг стрелял на поражение. Меткий выстрел превратил легкое парня в лохмотья — удивительно, что он еще не захлебнулся кровью.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг стрелял на поражение. Меткий выстрел превратил легкое парня в лохмотья — удивительно, что он еще не захлебнулся кровью.{/n}

{n}Monteg was shooting to kill. An aimed shot tore the young man's lung to shreds, he will choke on blood any moment now.{/n}
{n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

{n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich disparaba a matar, y un tiro preciso ha destrozado el pulmón del joven. Es un milagro que no se haya ahogado aún en su propia sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich disparaba a matar, y un tiro preciso ha destrozado el pulmón del joven. Es un milagro que no se haya ahogado aún en su propia sangre.{/n}
{n}Monteg disparaba a matar, y un tiro preciso ha destrozado el pulmón del joven. No tardará en ahogarse con su propia sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは殺す気で弾を放ち、その完璧に狙い澄ました一発が、青年の肺をズタズタに引き裂いた。彼が自分の血をのどに詰まらせなかったのが不思議なくらいだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは殺す気で弾を放ち、その完璧に狙い澄ました一発が、青年の肺をズタズタに引き裂いた。彼が自分の血をのどに詰まらせなかったのが不思議なくらいだ。{/n}
{n}モンテグは殺す気で弾を放ち、その完璧に狙い澄ました一発が、青年の肺をズタズタに引き裂いた。男は今にも自分の血で息を詰まらせてしまいそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇那一枪非常致命，一记精准的射击撕碎了这个年轻人的肺部。他还没被自己的鲜血呛死，这简直是个奇迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇那一枪非常致命，一记精准的射击撕碎了这个年轻人的肺部。他还没被自己的鲜血呛死，这简直是个奇迹。{/n}
{n}蒙特格那一枪非常致命。一记精准的射击击穿了这个年轻人的肺部，他随时都可能被自己的鲜血呛死。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrichs perfekt gezielter Schuss hat die Lunge des jungen Mannes zerfetzt. Es grenzt an ein Wunder, dass er noch nicht an seinem eigenen Blut erstickt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrichs perfekt gezielter Schuss hat die Lunge des jungen Mannes zerfetzt. Es grenzt an ein Wunder, dass er noch nicht an seinem eigenen Blut erstickt ist.{/n}
{n}Montegs perfekt gezielter Schuss hat die Lunge des jungen Mannes völlig zerfetzt. Er wird jeden Augenblick an seinem eigenen Blut ersticken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich n'a pas fait dans la dentelle : il a visé directement le poumon, dont il ne reste plus grand-chose. C'est un miracle que le jeune homme ne se soit pas encore noyé dans son propre sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich n'a pas fait dans la dentelle : il a visé directement le poumon, dont il ne reste plus grand-chose. C'est un miracle que le jeune homme ne se soit pas encore noyé dans son propre sang.{/n}
{n}Monteg n'a pas fait dans la dentelle : il a visé directement le poumon, dont il ne reste plus grand-chose. Le pauvre jeune homme va se noyer dans son propre sang d'un moment à l'autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich, öldürme gayesiyle ateş açmış. Kusursuz bir atış, adamın akciğerlerini paramparça etmiş. Henüz kendi kanında boğulmamış olması mucize.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich was shooting to kill, and a perfectly aimed shot has torn the young man's lung to shreds. It is a wonder he has not choked on his own blood already.{/n}
